org.jeo.mongo

Interface MongoMapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMapper, GeoJSONMapper

    public interface MongoMapper
    Strategy interface for mapping documents in a mongo collection to features.
    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Envelope bbox(com.mongodb.DBCollection dbcol, MongoDataset data)
      Computes the bounding box of a mongo collection.
      Feature feature(com.mongodb.DBObject obj, MongoDataset data)
      Creates a feature from a mongo object.
      com.mongodb.DBObject object(Feature f, MongoDataset data)
      Creates a mongo object from a feature.
      com.mongodb.DBObject query(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Envelope bbox, MongoDataset data)
      Encodes a bounding box query.
